title: Sky News
summary: Sky News is a British free-to-air television news channel and organisation. Sky News is distributed via a radio news service, and through online channels. It is owned by Sky Group, a division of Comcast. John Ryley is the head of Sky News, a role he has held since June 2006. In 2019, Sky News was named Royal Television Society News Channel of the Year, the 12th time it has held the award.[1] It is a provider of live streaming world news which can be viewed via its website, YouTube, and various mobile devices and digital media players.
